# Lemon pudding

## Ingredients

* 1 cup heated milk
* 2 eggs
* 1 cup sugar
* 1 lemon
* 0.66 cup flour
* 0.125 tsp slat
* 1 Tbl margarine

## Instructions

Separate egg yolks from whites. Beat the yolks until they are lemon colored. Add margarine to warm milk an dmelt. Pour slowly over the egg yolks. Mix well. Mix the dry ingredients together and add to milk and eggs. Stir in the juice and grated rind from one lemon. Beat egg whites until stiff. Folkd the whites into the egg yolk mixture. Pour into a buttered souffle pan. Place in a pan of hot water and bake at 350&deg;F for 47 minutes.
